channel.title: Highscores help
channel.description:
So I have an Domain called Spectacular.lt
When I creat Highscores should I change : LOCALHOST TO SPECTACULAR.LT?
My Mysql host is : mysqlhost I have my msql password, db name too.
So should i change?
[code]When i do that i get : Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /home/xevil/domains/spectacular.lt/public_html/highscores/functions.php on line 334 No database selected[/code]
My Funcionts.php :
[u]http://pastebin.com/jfpz2rCT[/u]

item.title: Highscores help

So I have an Domain called Spectacular.lt
